patch 8.2.2284: Vim9: cannot set an option to a boolean value

Problem:    Vim9: cannot set an option to a boolean value.
Solution:   Check for VAR_BOOL. (closes #7603)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2284: Vim9: cannot set an option to a boolean value · vim/vim@31a201a
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2284: Vim9: cannot set an option to a boolean value · vim/vim@31a201a
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: cannot set an option to a boolean value. Solution: Check for VAR_BOOL. (closes #7603)

patch 8.2.2283: Vim9: crash when lambda has fewer arguments than expected

Solution:   Don't check arguments when already failed. (closes #7606)

patch 8.2.2281: Vim9: compiled "wincmd" cannot be followed by bar

Solution:   Check for bar after "wincmd". (closes #7599)

patch 8.2.2280: fuzzy matching doesn't give access to the scores

Problem:    Fuzzy matching doesn't give access to the scores.
Solution:   Return the scores with a third list. (Yegappan Lakshmanan,
            closes #7596)

patch 8.2.2279: Vim9: memory leak with catch in skipped block

Problem:    Vim9: memory leak with catch in skipped block.
Solution:   Free the pattern if not used.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2279: Vim9: memory leak with catch in skipped block · vim/vim@508b561
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2279: Vim9: memory leak with catch in skipped block · vim/vim@508b561
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: memory leak with catch in skipped block. Solution: Free the pattern if not used.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/66c50c565321d4d49d8d5620912e5e8fe4825644|patch 8.2.2278: falling back to old regexp engine can some patterns>
patch 8.2.2278: falling back to old regexp engine can some patterns

Problem:    Falling back to old regexp engine can some patterns.
Solution:   Do not fall back once [[:lower:]] or [[:upper:]] is used.
            (Christian Brabandt, closes #7572)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2278: falling back to old regexp engine can some patterns · vim/vim@66c50c5
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2278: falling back to old regexp engine can some patterns · vim/vim@66c50c5
attachments.text: Problem: Falling back to old regexp engine can some patterns. Solution: Do not fall back once [[:lower:]] or [[:upper:]] is used. (Christian Brabandt, closes #7572)

Solution:   Recognize the modifyOtherKeys code ending in "u". (Christian
            Brabandt, closes #7575)
